item.title: Homebrew: How to Install Apache on MacOS
item.description: Prerequisites Homebrew: Homebrew is a free and open-source software package management system that simplifies the installation of software on Apple’s macOS operating system. Please install Homebrew based on the official site The installation steps. Uninstall pre-installed Apache (if any). Run this command sudo Apachectl stop sudo launchctl unload -w /System/Library/LaunchDaemons/org.Apache.httpd.plist Install Apache (httpd) using Homebrew. Run this command brew install httpd Start the Apache.
